title: A classy classic
description: Elegant little deduction game that you can play with just about anyone.  So cheap and classic and fun that there’s no reason NOT to have a copy!

title: Easy game,...
description: Easy game, fast paste, easy to learn.Played this game with my mom and sister who arent into gaming at all and they loved it!

title: Pretty fun...
description: Pretty fun filler deduction-based card game.

title: Alright, t...
description: Alright, this game is great fun, and for only 16 cards, and can be taught in about 2 minutes, and can be played in about 10 minutes.  Uh, this one is a winner.After a bit of time, it kind of loses its luster a bit.  Because it's so small, nearly every interaction is seen after only a few games, then you're just kind of going through the motions at that point.  It's still fine mainly because it's so short, but it just doesn't have enough oomph to keep it around or make it a staple.
